sentence.Network_en: You might call it an avocational hazard.
sentence.Network_cn: 你可以将之称为一心两用的危险.

sentence.Network_en: As far as avocational hobby is concerned, Jennifer and her sister have almost nothing in common.
sentence.Network_cn: 就业余爱好而言, 珍妮和她妹妹几乎没有什么共同之处.

my greatest avocation is musing . I can stay by myself for a long time without disconsolate in the least .我的最大爱好是深思默想。我可以一个人长时间地独处而感到愉快。

Learning foreign languages is just an avocation with me ., 学外语是我的一项爱好.
